name: prd-workflow
description: Ryan Carson's 3-step AI coding workflow: PRD generation → task list → one-task-at-a-time execution. Enforces structured feature development via rule files in rules/.

commands.init: Scaffold a new feature: creates tasks/ dir and prints step-by-step agent instructions
commands.status: Show current task list progress from tasks/TASKS.md
commands.reset: Archive the current tasks/ dir and start fresh

inputs.name: FEATURE
inputs.description: Short feature name (used for directory naming on reset, e.g. 'user-auth')

outputs.description: Instructions for the agent to follow, or task list status

notes: Rule files live in rules/. Task files are written to tasks/. One feature at a time. See README.md for full workflow.
